price: 2. (O mokolo mwa suka) bapengwi bakolobaka ete: Soki tozalaka ata ba mizilima.
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
